bibdata.title: Report on international travel to Europe
April 23

May 13, 1964 : 1) to attend the International Organization for Standardization (ISO) Meeting on the Chemical Analysis of Textiles; 2) to discuss standardization, test methods, research and education at various European laboratories

Report on international travel to Europe - April 23 - May 13, 1964 : 1) to attend the International Organization for Standardization (ISO) Meeting on the Chemical Analysis of Textiles; 2) to discuss standardization, test methods, research and education at various European laboratories
